name: Stop the Atomic War
description:
This is a game made for Weekly Game Jam - Week 90

Theme:Radioactivity

FullScreen not supported

This is my first game jam ever I hope you enjoy this short game I made in 3 days.I would like to hear your opinion about this game and what could have been made better.Still thanks for playing my game.

If you want you can follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Aticora_Games
